infoPanels.heading: THE PROGRAM
infoPanels.content: Spaces'x SmallSat Rideshare Program will provide small satelite operators regularly scheded, dedicated for ESPA class payloads for as low as $1M per mission, which  includes up to 200 kg payload mass

infoPanels.heading: PAYLOADS
infoPanels.content: For payloads who run into development or production challenges leading up to launch, SpaceX will allow them to apply 100% of money paid towards the cost of rebooking on a suvsequent mission, subject to a 10% rebooking fee.
